page.title: 19ATTITUDES IN WOODHALL SPA
page.content: {ATTITUDES IN WOODHALL SPA} {Housing}Many people now live in either council house accomodation,rented property or their own homes.Because services are concentrated in one place many isolated tied cottages are now falling into disrepair as they are no longer required because farmers are much more mechanised than ever before and therefore require fewer men to manage greater numbers of acres.{ {Religion}Many church going people think we are at the turning point after a decline of 40yrs and after reaching a low ebb through the permissive years of the 60s & 70s.Many are questioning the results of this permissiveness and are seeking something more substantial & abiding.{ {Government}At a local level there is much apathy & elections occur seldom. Turnout for elections is poor.
